text_raw:

title: 4(1)(d) and 12F(1) of the Communications (Retention of Data) Act 2011 (No.
heading: In these Regulations, “Act of 2011” means the Communications
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Act of 2011” means the Communications 

(Retention of Data) Act 2011 (No. 3 of 2011).
text_norm: 2 regulation act 2011 mean communication (retention data) act 2011 (no 3 2011)

title: 4(1)(d) and 12F(1) of the Communications (Retention of Data) Act 2011 (No.
heading: 3. For the purposes of section 4(1)(d) of the Act of 2011-
text_raw:
3. For the purposes of section 4(1)(d) of the Act of 2011- 

(a) 

(b) 

the period of 13 months from the date on which the data were 
first processed by the service provider concerned is prescribed in 
respect of data retained under section 3(1), 3A(5) or 3B(1) of the 
Act, and 

the period of 1 month from the day on which the order 
concerned ceases to have effect is prescribed in respect of data 
retained under section 7A(11) or 7B(10) of the Act.

title: 4(1)(d) and 12F(1) of the Communications (Retention of Data) Act 2011 (No.
heading: 4. These Regulations shall come into operation on 26 June 2023.
text_raw:
4. These Regulations shall come into operation on 26 June 2023. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 June, 2023. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th July, 2023.
